title: SMC_ChangeDynamicLimits (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ChangeDynamicLimits
Sets the dynamic limits (maximum velocity, acceleration, jerk, torque)
for an axis.
May only be called if the axis is in state
power_off
or
standstill
.

rows: The maximum velocity in u/s.  Must be positive.

The torque limit is interpreted based on the gearbox output.
